query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS queues (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT gen_random_uuid(),
  user_id UUID NOT NULL REFERENCES auth.users(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  queue_type TEXT NOT NULL CHECK (queue_type IN ('blanca', 'azul', 'roja')),
  mobile_id TEXT NOT NULL,
  position INTEGER NOT NULL,
  total_amount NUMERIC DEFAULT 0,
  cede_count INTEGER DEFAULT 0,
  created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW(),
  updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT NOW(),
  UNIQUE(user_id, queue_type, mobile_id)
);

CREATE INDEX idx_queues_user_id ON queues(user_id);
CREATE INDEX idx_queues_queue_type ON queues(queue_type);
